class.rdfs:comment: A set of characteristics belonging to people, e.g. who compose an item's target audience.
class.rdfs:label: PeopleAudience

schema:healthCondition.rdfs:comment: Specifying the health condition(s) of a patient, medical study, or other target audience.
schema:healthCondition.rdfs:label: healthCondition

schema:requiredGender.rdfs:comment: Audiences defined by a person's gender.
schema:requiredGender.rdfs:label: requiredGender

schema:requiredMaxAge.rdfs:comment: Audiences defined by a person's maximum age.
schema:requiredMaxAge.rdfs:label: requiredMaxAge

schema:requiredMinAge.rdfs:comment: Audiences defined by a person's minimum age.
schema:requiredMinAge.rdfs:label: requiredMinAge

schema:suggestedGender.rdfs:comment: The gender of the person or audience.
schema:suggestedGender.rdfs:label: suggestedGender

schema:suggestedMaxAge.rdfs:comment: Maximal age recommended for viewing content.
schema:suggestedMaxAge.rdfs:label: suggestedMaxAge

schema:suggestedMinAge.rdfs:comment: Minimal age recommended for viewing content.
schema:suggestedMinAge.rdfs:label: suggestedMinAge
